title: Best Team Award - TCS Rapid Labs Cohort
description: Awarded Best Team Award in the prestigious TCS Rapid Labs Cohort, demonstrating exceptional technical and collaborative skills in AI and robotics research.

title: Juror - LaElevitia Hackathon 2023
description: Served as a technical juror for the LaElevitia Hackathon Event, evaluating projects from over 80 students and showcasing technical expertise and leadership potential.

title: Innovation Centre Club Organizer & Mentor
description: Actively organized and mentored students in AI & robotics education and outreach programs, showcasing robotics projects at inter-university events and conducting workshops.

title: TCS Rapid Labs Cohort Selection
description: Selected into the elite TCS Rapid Labs Cohort, an exclusive R&D team focused on cutting-edge technologies including AI and Robotics.
